name: acquisitiveness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
often disapproving eagerness to own and collect things: He was known for his acquisitiveness, buying any work of art that caught his eye.
business
  specialized the fact that a company buys other companies: The group's acquisitiveness seems to be holding down its stock price.
